function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through construction sites due to lack of adherence to guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for construction workers and surrounding communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict adherence to CDC, DOL, AGC, and OSHA guidelines for construction sites","Technologies":"Remote monitoring, wearable technology for social distancing enforcement","People":"Construction workers, surrounding communities","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, government regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of education and awareness about best practices in dealing with the pandemic in the construction industry","Impact":"Higher probability of non-compliance with safety guidelines, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, training programs, and dissemination of guidelines to construction practitioners","Technologies":"Online training platforms, augmented reality for virtual training","People":"Construction practitioners, workers, site managers","Owner":"Industry associations, regulatory bodies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Dependency on external organizations for the development of best practices and guidelines","Impact":"Vulnerability to delays or changes in guidelines from external organizations, leading to confusion and non-compliance","Mitigation":"Establishment of internal expertise and guidelines based on industry-specific research and best practices","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI for predictive analysis of disease spread","People":"Industry experts, researchers, construction companies","Owner":"Construction companies, research institutions"}]}
